narrative: Prepared integration scaffold for forthcoming FTS work. Restored complete .gitignore with Node additions, created specs for database, RL, use cases, documentation, seven-step process, and technical implementation. Added placeholder modules under fts/ and documented them in README. These changes establish a clear structure for incoming contributions.
user_input: Seek to prepare an integration plan for receiving their work like what would you expect to receive? How would that integrate into this repository? What would be affected? Write in natural language ./specs/<component/service/...>.spec.md foreach of the potential implementations that could occurs. Upgrade/enhance anything in what you did to make this happen
